https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nGjhTL7XtQZ1JQTsSPZfnVRS3w1.jpg A vengeful ex-con goes on a 24 hour killing spree, never saying a word. The discredited detective investigating the case is convinced there is more to it than the evidence suggests. 24 Little Hours
